title: Ticket #5838: condor_history -l can take super-long to finish
description:
Just running condor_history on submit-4.chtc.wisc.edu. For example: 

  condor_history -l 3741329.0

spits out the expected output, but then doesn't finish (or takes really a long time to finish, anyhow). (I think this one has been running 10-15 minutes...)
creator: wenger
